hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Another year circo2 side effects What Francis has urged, though, is a new painting. Black and white is vital, but the true picture can only be understood through a whole variety of colors. So this is a Pope of nuance and backstory, of delicacy and empathy of delivery. Truth needs to be sung rather than shouted, and he is telling the world â and particularly those who have left the Church and those who hide behind its rules instead of being liberated by them â that while we cannot compromise on truth, we must not compromise on love.
